subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Dear Dale
Yes, I am well and you!

Thank you for your email, we finance projects after a careful study of the business plan to know its existing strategy, as part of our procedure for consideration of project for possible funding, we expect to receive a detailed project summary and business plan for our due diligence and evaluation to support your bid for funding to enable our strategic/evaluation team understand the project and decide whether or not to accept it for funding, and if the project as presented is acceptable and within our scope of funding, we shall thus make you an offer in a very clear and precise terms.

We expect your project presentation/business plan to be able to cover the following functional areas:

The structure or an Introduction of the project owner/initiator

Historical evaluation of business plan (if it is an already existing project or state if it is a new project)

Financial structure and analysis to support the investment plan and proposition as presented.

After our evaluation on the business plan, we will send you our official macro loan application form, and if your application is approved, we will furnish you the official Loan Agreement for your review and signatories, to enable us to present you the official approval, with an official invitation for a face-to-face for closing and proceed to the payment institution for disbursement of funds.

Kind regards and looking forward to hearing from you to move forward.
